item.description: Even though Guam doesn't have a say in the presidential election, its citizens still come out and vote for the country they love.

item.title: Stressed at work over the election? 3 ways to minimize political tension on the job
item.description: Political disagreements have sent workplace incivility to an all-time high this year, costing employers some $2 billion per day in lost productivity. Here’s how to cut down on watercooler fights over today’s election – and its aftermath.
